  "domainId" : "1234",
  "theme" : {
    "logoSvg" : null,
    "themeColour" : {
      "primary" : "#007D76",
      "secondary" : "#E6354C",

      "danger" : "#d5d5d5",
      "dangerText" : "#161616",

  }
}' | http POST 'http://localhost:8080/repo/domainFlowConfigurations' \
